other_tests.findings: Gallbladder is distended with diffuse, mild wall-thickening and edema. Multiple echogenic, mobile, shadowing gallstones in the lumen with no clear obstructing stone. Spleen enlarged measuring 15 cm (increased from prior measure of 12.5 cm). Simple cortical cyst noted in both kidneys.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Spleen size increased from 12.5 cm to 15 cm.
